S:log-item.D:comment: LUCENE-748: add javadoc around semantics of Exception during IndexWriter.close() LUCENE-129: fix finalizers to always call super.finalize LUCENE-301: add new constructors IndexWriter({String,File,Directory}, Analyzer) that create index if it's not already there, else append LUCENE-701: found two cases of "open IndexWriter for create while reader is open, on Windows" that I didn't properly fix; added new test cases LUCENE-702: corrected some small javadoc issues
